vulnerability.name: USN-4715-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4715-1 fixed a vulnerability in Django. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Wang Baohua discovered that Django incorrectly extracted archive files. A  remote attacker could possibly use this issue to extract files outside of  their expected location.

statements.status_notes: Django could be made to overwrite files. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
